reviews.review: He is an excellent teacher. He genuinely wants you to understand the topics he is teaching, and is always accommodating to questions. His tests are usually 105 points but he grades them out of 100, so we get those 5 points back, and on top of that each exam is curved generously. He really wants you to excel in his class, and it shows in his teaching.
He is such an amazing teacher. Curves on the tests are great, and he encourages questions. Show up to class it makes a difference!
He is nice and understanding. He curves well, he wants us to learn is overall great. he really just wants you to try your best and we will reward that.
